issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Warning message "npm WARN package.json cycle@1.0.0 No README.md file found!" during npm install of the CLI.

Steps:
1. Run "sudo npm install -g titanium"

Expected:
No warning messages

Actual:
Warning message "npm WARN package.json cycle@1.0.0 No README.md file found!"
fields.summary: CLI: Warning message during npm install of the CLI

comments.body: Cycle is a dependency that we do not own and it's perfectly fine that a node module does not have a README file.
